languages.text: Одна только попытка задуматься о необъяснимых свойств зеркала бросает в дрожь.
It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.
languages.original_text: Одна только попытка задуматься о необъяснимых свойств зеркала бросает в дрожь.

traits.locale_text: Even the slightest thought about the mirror and its eldritch properties leave one shivering with fear.
Even the slightest thought about the mirror and its eldritch properties leave one shivering with fear.
Even the slightest thought about the mirror and its freakish qualities leave one shivering with fear.
It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.
It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.
It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.

languages.text: 即便理解了这面镜子古怪的特性，它也依然令人感到毛骨悚然。
languages.original_text: It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.

traits.locale_text: 即便理解了这面镜子古怪的特性，它也依然令人感到毛骨悚然。

languages.text: Solo contemplar las propiedades inexplicables del espejo basta para provocar escalofríos.
languages.original_text: It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.

traits.locale_text: Solo contemplar las propiedades inexplicables del espejo basta para provocar escalofríos.

languages.text: 鏡の不可解な性質を考えるだけでも背筋が凍る。
languages.original_text: It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.

traits.locale_text: 鏡の不可解な性質を考えるだけでも背筋が凍る。

languages.text: Wenn man nur über die unerklärlichen Eigenschaften des Spiegels nachdenkt, läuft es einem schon eiskalt den Rücken herunter.
languages.original_text: It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.

traits.locale_text: Wenn man nur über die unerklärlichen Eigenschaften des Spiegels nachdenkt, läuft es einem schon eiskalt den Rücken herunter.

languages.text: Les propriétés mystérieuses de ce miroir ont de quoi donner froid dans le dos.
languages.original_text: It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.

traits.locale_text: Les propriétés mystérieuses de ce miroir ont de quoi donner froid dans le dos.

languages.text: Aynanın bu açıklanamaz yapısını düşünmek bile insanın tüylerini ürpertiyor.
languages.original_text: It is spine-chilling even to contemplate the mirror's inexplicable properties.
